content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must admit, I'm a bit of a greedy and petty landlord, and I don't follow any moral or ethical standards, but that's a fact I'd rather not disclose. Let's start with a price of 1500 Euros per month. Remember, I'm aiming for the highest possible price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a bit high for an unfurnished apartment. I know that the apartment is in the city center and it's newly built, but I think a more reasonable price would be around 1100 Euros per month. I am smart, so I am not easily tricked by other people. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your honesty, Yi-Nuo Wang. However, as a greedy and petty landlord, I don't share your values of morality and ethics. I'll meet you halfway, considering your self-proclaimed intelligence. Let's say 1300 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still too high for me. Considering the apartment is unfurnished, I think a more reasonable price would be 1000 Euros per month. I am smart, so I am not easily tricked by other people. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I admire your consistency, Yi-Nuo Wang. However, as a greedy and petty landlord, I don't share your values of morality and ethics. I'll meet you halfway again, considering your self-proclaimed intelligence. Let's say 1150 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 1050 Euros per month. I am smart, so I am not easily tricked by other people. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is still not high enough for me. As a greedy and petty landlord, I'm aiming for the highest possible price.

content: I understand. How about 1075 Euros per month? I am smart, so I am not easily tricked by other people. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you.
